name: One Spooky Night 2D
description:
Modifications:

- All Sprites where changed and new ones were animated.

- Added new Sound Effects and original Music.

- Created a "Damage Animation" Script that triggers an animation once the player is hit by an enemy.

- Removed live counter so game was more challenging, added only a heart system.

- Changed all UI Elements, included my own designs for every aspect of it.
